TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TextRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法用來測量及呈現文字。

span.span: Provides methods used to measure and render text.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供一組`static`可用來測量和 Windows Form 控制項上繪製文字的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used for measuring and drawing text on a Windows Form control. 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 例如， 的預設行為是將邊框距離加入至已繪製之文字的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)，以容納突出 (Overhanging) 的圖像 (Glyph)。For example, the default behavior of the is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. 如果您需要繪製一行文字而不含這些額外空格，則應該使用會採用 和 參數的 和 版本。If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of and that take a and parameter. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see . > [!NOTE] > 的 方法不支援列印。The methods of are not supported for printing. 您應該一律使用方法的類別。You should always use the methods of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText1`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText1` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 使用指定的裝置內容、色彩和字型，在指定的位置上繪製指定的文字。

span.span: Draws the specified text at the specified location, using the specified device context, color, and font.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DrawText (System.Drawing.IDeviceContext dc, string text, System.Drawing.Font font, System.Drawing.Point pt, System.Drawing.Color foreColor);

.method public static hidebysig void DrawText(class System.Drawing.IDeviceContext dc, string text, class System.Drawing.Font font, valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt, valuetype System.Drawing.Color foreColor) cil managed

static member DrawText : System.Drawing.IDeviceContext * string * System.Drawing.Font * System.Drawing.Point * System.Drawing.Color -> unit

param.name: dc
param.span: 要在其中繪製文字的裝置內容。

span.span: The device context in which to draw the text.
The text to draw.
The to apply to the drawn text.

param.name: pt
param.span: ，表示已繪製之文字的左上角。

span.span: The that represents the upper-left corner of the drawn text.
The to apply to the drawn text.

summary.span: 使用指定的裝置內容、字型和色彩，在指定的位置上繪製指定的文字。

span.span: Draws the specified text at the specified location using the specified device context, font, and color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 如果`font`是`null`或是`forecolor`是，則方法將會繪製在字型或色彩所指定的裝置內容中目前選取的文字`dc`。If `font` is `null` or `forecolor` is , the method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`. 如果`forecolor`是，就不會繪製文字。If `forecolor` is , the text will not be drawn. 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class. > [!NOTE] > 指定的方法繪製文字左上角為無法正確呈現在 Windows 2000 上。The methods that specify a as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000. 如果您的應用程式適合在執行 Windows 2000 的電腦上的使用中，您應該使用其中一個指定的方法繪製文字的繫結。If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the methods that specify a for the bounds of the drawn text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText1`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText1` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/CS/Form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/VB/Form1.vb#2)]

span.span: Draws the specified text within the specified bounds, using the specified device context, font, and color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`font`或是`forecolor`是`null`或是分別;方法將會繪製在字型或色彩所指定的裝置內容中目前選取的文字`dc`。If `font` or `forecolor` is `null` or , respectively; the method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`. 如果`forecolor`是，就不會繪製文字。If `forecolor` is , the text will not be drawn. 這個方法會以水平和垂直置中所指定的矩形中的文字`bounds`參數。This method will result in text that is horizontally and vertically centered in the rectangle specified by the `bounds` parameter. 若要變更繪製文字的方式，使用新版採用參數類型。To change how the text is drawn, use a version of that takes a parameter type. 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText2`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText2` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks `backColor`參數會套用至包含所繪製的文字的矩形區域。The `backColor` parameter is applied to the rectangular area containing the drawn text. 如果`font`，`backcolor`或是`forecolor`是`null`或是分別;方法將會繪製在字型或色彩所指定的裝置內容中目前選取的文字`dc`。If `font`, `backcolor` or `forecolor` is `null` or , respectively; the method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`. 如果`forecolor`是，就不會繪製文字。If `forecolor` is , the text will not be drawn. 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class. > [!NOTE] > 指定的方法繪製文字左上角為無法正確呈現在 Windows 2000 上。The methods that specify a as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000. 如果您的應用程式適合在執行 Windows 2000 的電腦上的使用中，您應該使用其中一個指定的方法繪製文字的繫結。If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the methods that specify a for the bounds of the drawn text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText3`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText3` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 例如， 的預設行為是將邊框距離加入至已繪製之文字的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)，以容納突出 (Overhanging) 的圖像 (Glyph)。For example, the default behavior of the is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. 如果您需要繪製一行文字而不含這些額外空格，則應該使用會採用 和 參數的 和 版本。If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of and that take a and parameter. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see . `backColor`參數會套用至的區域內`bounds`參數。The `backColor` parameter is applied to the area within the `bounds` parameter. 如果`font`或是`forecolor`是`null`或是分別;方法將會繪製在字型或色彩所指定的裝置內容中目前選取的文字`dc`。If `font` or `forecolor` is `null` or , respectively; the method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`. 如果`forecolor`是，就不會繪製文字。If `forecolor` is , the text will not be drawn. 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class. 不支援新增定位停駐點要繪製的文字，雖然您可以擴充現有的索引標籤可讓您停止使用的實務旗標。The does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the flag. > [!NOTE] > 指定的方法繪製文字左上角為無法正確呈現在 Windows 2000 上。The methods that specify a as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000. 如果您的應用程式適合在執行 Windows 2000 的電腦上的使用中，您應該使用其中一個指定的方法繪製文字的繫結。If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the methods that specify a for the bounds of the drawn text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText5`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText5` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . summary.span: 使用指定的裝置內容、字型、色彩、背景色彩和格式化指示，在指定的位置上繪製指定的文字。

span.span: Draws the specified text at the specified location using the specified device context, font, color, back color, and formatting instructions

remarks.format: ## Remarks `backcolor`參數套用包含所繪製的文字的矩形區域。The `backcolor` parameter is applied the rectangular area containing the drawn text. 如果`font`或是`forecolor`是`null`或是分別;方法將會繪製在字型或色彩所指定的裝置內容中目前選取的文字`dc`。If `font` or `forecolor` is `null` or , respectively; the method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`. 如果`forecolor`是，就不會繪製文字。If `forecolor` is , the text will not be drawn. 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 例如， 的預設行為是將邊框距離加入至已繪製之文字的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)，以容納突出 (Overhanging) 的圖像 (Glyph)。For example, the default behavior of the is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. 如果您需要繪製一行文字而不含這些額外空格，則應該使用會採用 和 參數的 和 版本。If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of and that take a and parameter. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see . 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class. 不支援新增定位停駐點要繪製的文字，雖然您可以擴充現有的索引標籤可讓您停止使用的實務旗標。The does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the flag. > [!NOTE] > 指定的方法繪製文字左上角為無法正確呈現在 Windows 2000 上。The methods that specify a as the upper-left corner of the drawn text do not render correctly on Windows 2000. 如果您的應用程式適合在執行 Windows 2000 的電腦上的使用中，您應該使用其中一個指定的方法繪製文字的繫結。If your application is intended for use on machines running Windows 2000, you should use one of the methods that specify a for the bounds of the drawn text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText7`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText7` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `backcolor`參數會套用至的區域內`bounds`參數`.`如果`font`，`forecolor`或是`backcolor`是`null`或分別;方法將繪製文字的字型或所指定的裝置內容中目前選取的色彩在`dc`。The `backcolor` parameter is applied to the area within the `bounds` parameter`.` If `font`, `forecolor` or `backcolor` is `null` or , respectively; the method will draw the text in the font or color currently selected in the device context specified by `dc`. 如果`forecolor`是，就不會繪製文字。If `forecolor` is , the text will not be drawn. 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 例如， 的預設行為是將邊框距離加入至已繪製之文字的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)，以容納突出 (Overhanging) 的圖像 (Glyph)。For example, the default behavior of the is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. 如果您需要繪製一行文字而不含這些額外空格，則應該使用會採用 和 參數的 和 版本。If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of and that take a and parameter. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see . 所提供的文字轉譯類別為基礎的 GDI 文字轉譯，並不支援從 Windows Forms 中列印。The text rendering offered by the class is based on GDI text rendering and is not supported for printing from Windows Forms. 請改用方法的類別。Instead, use the methods of the class. 不支援新增定位停駐點要繪製的文字，雖然您可以擴充現有的索引標籤可讓您停止使用的實務旗標。The does not support adding tab stops to drawn text, although you can expand existing tab stops using the flag. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`RenderText8`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `RenderText8` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用`proposedSize`參數，以指定的高度與寬度的關聯性，判斷文字大小。The method uses the `proposedSize` parameter to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size. 當測量，在單一行上的文字，如果`proposedSize`參數代表與高度維度大於，傳回會調整，以反映實際文字的高度。When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a with a height dimension greater than , the returned will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用其中一種方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use one of the methods. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`DrawALineOfText`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `DrawALineOfText` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用`proposedSize`和`flags`表示時決定的文字大小的高度與寬度的關聯性的參數。 uses the `proposedSize` and `flags` parameters to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size. 當測量，在單一行上的文字，如果`proposedSize`參數代表與高度維度大於，傳回會調整，以反映實際文字的高度。When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a with a height dimension greater than , the returned will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text. 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 例如， 的預設行為是將邊框距離加入至已繪製之文字的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)，以容納突出 (Overhanging) 的圖像 (Glyph)。For example, the default behavior of the is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. 如果您需要繪製一行文字而不含這些額外空格，則應該使用會採用 和 參數的 和 版本。If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces you should use the versions of and that take a and parameter. 如需範例，請參閱 。For an example, see . > [!NOTE] > 這個多載將會忽略的值或。This overload of will ignore a value of or . 如果您指定的填補值，預設值以外，您應該使用的多載採用物件。If you are specifying a padding value other than the default, you should use the overload of that takes a object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用其中一種方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use one of the methods. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼的 Windows Form 和呼叫`DrawALineOfText`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example, paste the code into a Windows Form and call `DrawALineOfText` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用`proposedSize`和`flags`表示時決定的文字大小的高度與寬度的關聯性的參數。The method uses the `proposedSize` and `flags` parameters to indicate the relationship of height to width when determining the text size. 當測量，在單一行上的文字，如果`proposedSize`參數代表與高度維度大於，傳回會調整，以反映實際文字的高度。When measuring text on a single line, if the `proposedSize` parameter represents a with a height dimension greater than , the returned will be adjusted to reflect the actual height of the text. 您可以使用其中一個採用 參數的 多載，管理文字的繪製方式。You can manipulate how the text is drawn by using one of the overloads that takes a parameter. 例如， 的預設行為是將邊框距離加入至已繪製之文字的週框 (Bounding Rectangle)，以容納突出 (Overhanging) 的圖像 (Glyph)。For example, the default behavior of the is to add padding to the bounding rectangle of the drawn text to accommodate overhanging glyphs. 如果您需要繪製一行文字，不含這些額外的空格，使用新版並採用和參數，如範例所示。If you need to draw a line of text without these extra spaces, use the versions of and that take a and parameter, as shown in the example. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用和方法，以繪製不同的字型樣式中的單行文字。The following example demonstrates how to use the and methods to draw a single line of text in different font styles. 若要執行此範例中貼上下列程式碼在 Windows Form，並呼叫`DrawALineOfText`從表單事件處理常式，傳遞`e`做為。To run this example paste the following code in a Windows Form and call `DrawALineOfText` from the form's event handler, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/CS/Form1.cs#11)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.TextRendererExamples/VB/Form1.vb#11)]

span.span: is .
